item.title: [RELEASE] Slayer Helmet + My own attempt at Hunter Cape
item.dc:creator: @I_PK_Pigeons I PK Pigeons
item.description:
@I_PK_Pigeons wrote:

[quote=“the1337legend, post:11, topic:272934”][quote author=I PK Pigeons link=topic=360253.msg2750155#msg2750155 date=1239854218]

Lol dude.
Models for the hunter cape are as following:

Inv - 19977
Wield - 19873

yh i just found that, cant get it animated tho, ;[, uhm yes the hunter cape was just a recolour but i was just postin somethin for the ppl who want a temporary hunter cape b.c i kno not too many 317 have em, (that i kno of) ill get a pic of slay helm in a min, takes awile to upload on dial up ><

Just use the 474 model version of the cape, doesn’t need animating or converting…
[/quote]

erm,474 would need to b converted to 317 tho wouldnt it? :S, nd also i just looked at the actual hutner cape and notice some small colour flaws (on middle piece of cape) and i might fix that, unless u want to urself :P[/quote]
474 is before the HD update, so nothing on them needs converting, and the pink trim is on every cape, that’s why they all have to be recoloured.

	 case 2677:
		class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
		class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear";
                class8.anIntArray156 = new int[5];
		class8.anIntArray160 = new int[5];
		class8.anIntArray156[0] = 57280;
		class8.anIntArray156[1] = 54503;
		class8.anIntArray156[2] = 54183;
		class8.anIntArray156[3] = 11200;
		class8.anIntArray160[0] = 923;
		class8.anIntArray160[1] = 920;
		class8.anIntArray160[2] = 920;
		class8.anIntArray160[3] = 923;
		class8.anInt174 = 4158;
		class8.anInt181 = 2000;
		class8.anInt190 = 500;
		class8.anInt198 = 0;
		class8.anInt169 = -6;
		class8.anInt194 = 1;
		class8.anInt204 = 14;
		class8.anInt165 = 4181;
		class8.anInt200 = 7178;
		class8.anInt175 = -1;
		class8.anInt197 = -1;
		class8.anInt199 = -1;
		class8.aString170 = "Attack cape";
		class8.aByteArray178 = "The cape worn by masters of Attack.".getBytes();
        break;
            class8.anIntArray156 = new int[5];
	class8.anIntArray160 = new int[5];
	class8.anIntArray156[0] = 57280;
	class8.anIntArray156[1] = 54503;
	class8.anIntArray156[2] = 54183;
	class8.anIntArray156[3] = 11200;
	class8.anIntArray160[0] = 923;
	class8.anIntArray160[1] = 920;
	class8.anIntArray160[2] = 920;
	class8.anIntArray160[3] = 923;

Is the recolouring part, if you remove those ints away you’ll have the pink trim on the cape

Read full topic

item.title: [RELEASE] Slayer Helmet + My own attempt at Hunter Cape
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

K well, i kno this is just a rsmv copy but i c lots of ppl looking for the real slay helmet and INTS

i take no credit for the model but only for the INTS

[code]if(i == 16036)

{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1];
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 0;
class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0;
class8.anInt174 = 10345;
class8.anInt181 = 1178;
class8.anInt190 = 498;
class8.anInt198 = 1840;
class8.anInt204 = 0;
class8.anInt169 = 0;
class8.anInt194 = 2;
class8.anInt165 = 13820;
class8.anInt200 = 13820;
class8.anInt175 = -1;
class8.anInt197 = -1;
class8.aBoolean176 = false;
class8.aString170 = “Slayer Helm”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “Its A Slayer Helm!”.getBytes();
}[/code]

Dl link http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=840dca3254285d85b64026cfc0611236e04e75f6e8ebb871

any questions, just ask o.O

BTW, besure to add this item to your item.cfg under Helm Fullhelm and hat or it will not wield.

Link- http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=840dca3254285d85b64026cfc0611236e04e75f6e8ebb871

} if(i == 16035) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[3]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int [3]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 0xD4E7; class8.anIntArray156[1] = 0xDFC0; class8.anIntArray156[2] = 0xD3A7; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 8128; class8.anIntArray160[1] = 9126; class8.anIntArray160[2] = 8128; class8.anInt174 = 13819; //Inv & Ground class8.anInt181 = 2000; //Zoom class8.anInt190 = 800; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 0; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt165 = 13819; //Male class8.anInt200 = 13819; //Female class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Hunter Cape(t)"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A Hunter Cape(t)".getBytes(); }

P.S i believe this was the cape that wasnt wielding properly (top came invisible) so if so, just reconstruct it or fix it to ur needs, as some ppl say, u cant get everything downloaded 100% complete for you! o.O
only 1 pic soz

++=======++
Slayer Helm Pix
++=======++

It looks like it needs to b resized a bit (larger) in game btw
